articles.author: Alexa Mae Asperin
articles.title: Coronavirus lingers in air of crowded spaces, new study reveals - KRON4
articles.description: At last check, there were nearly a million coronavirus cases in the United States alone, with close to three million confirmed cases worldwide.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO (KRON) – The coronavirus apparently lingers in the air in crowded spaces or rooms that lack ventilation, a new study published Monday in the journal Nature Research reveals.

articles.author: Emily Cleary
articles.title: Scientists urge caution after NHS warning of coronavirus-related syndrome emerging in children - Yahoo News
articles.description: North Central London NHS Trust sent a letter to doctors warning of a steep rise in admissions of youngsters to intensive care.
articles.content:
Scientists have said more evidence is needed before we can draw any conclusions from reports that a coronavirus-related syndrome could be emerging in children that leaves them in intensive care.
